description: Integrates with the Jira API to enable querying, creating, and modifying issues and projects, simplifying project tracking and management tasks.

HH_JIRA_MCP_TEAM.description: Jira team or project key (e.g., some-team)

HH_JIRA_MCP_SEARCH_FILTER.description: Jira JQL search filter (e.g., status in ("Development: In progress"))

name: Jira MCP Server
